text: Need Lily Walker for Officeworks campaign. Budget around $1,792, looking for 3 x Instagram story, 2 x Twitter post, 1 x Facebook post, 2 x Instagram story, 1 x Media interview. 8 week exclusivity from other electronics brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 4 months. Need to confirm: exclusivity period
